column1: suvarNa praBAsa sUtram

suvarNa praBAsa uttama sUtrendra rAjaH nidAna parivartaH om namaH SrI sarva budDa boDisattveByaH om namaH SrI BagavatyE Arya prajQApAramitAyE  tat yaTA om Sruti smRti gati vijaye svAhA yasmin pAramitAH daSa uttama guNAH tEH tEH nayEH sUcitAH sarvajQena jagat hitAya daSa ca praKyApitA BUmayaH ucCeda Druva varjitA ca vimalA proktA gatiH maDyamA tat sUtram svarNa praBA nigaditam SRNvantu boDi arTinaH

column1: samanantara udAhRte tEH budDEH BagavadBiH taTAgata AyuH pramANa nirdeSe aTa tAvat budDa anuBAvena kAmAvacarAH rUpAvacarAH ca deva putrAH saMnipatitA yAvat nAga yakza ganDarva asura garuxa kinnara mahA uragA anekAni ca boDisattva kowi niyuta Sata sahasrANi tasmin rucira ketu boDisattvasya gRhe samAgatAH Asan
column2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa brjod ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i bu 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams @409b dang; gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim der lhags so //

column2: tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya phrag stong de dag dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang / drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong thams cad pas ches mchog ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par bshad pa lags so //

column2: gnod pa dang / dgram mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul de dag na nad 'go ba ma mchis shing 'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar mi'i rgyal po de dag gis rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron me chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang /

column1: yaTA ca sarva devatA BavanAni bagCi  AdIpitAni Bavizyanti devEH deva putrEH ca yaTa ca vayam catvAraH mahA rAjAH sa bala parivArAH anekAni yakza Sata sahasrANi sarva jambu dvIpa gatAH ca deva gaNAH saMtarpitAH Bavizyant

column2: rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi brjid chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang / stobs dang / mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang / dpal dang / phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad lo legs shing nyams dga' ba dang / skye bo dang / @445b mis gang bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar sems can thams cad bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar lha dang / mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de lta na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gi lha'i shes pa bas ches 'phags pa /
